item.title: Putting Gale & Shapley to Work: Guaranteeing Stability Through Learning
item.description: Researchers improve two-sided matching market algorithms by prioritizing stability through novel bandit-learning algorithms, providing theoretical bounds on sample complexity and demonstrating intrigu…
